mongoose
code:
// Mongoose 3D Model

// Main body
scale([1.5, 1, 1]) {
    translate([0, 0, 10]) 
        sphere(r=10, $fn=40);  // Back body
    translate([-10, 0, 8]) 
        rotate([0, -15, 0]) 
        cylinder(h=20, r1=9, r2=7, center=true, $fn=40);  // Torso
}

// Head
translate([-25, 0, 10]) 
    rotate([0, 15, 0]) 
    scale([1.2, 0.9, 1]) 
    sphere(r=8, $fn=40);

// Snout
translate([-32, 0, 9]) 
    rotate([0, 10, 0]) 
    scale([1.5, 0.6, 0.6]) 
    sphere(r=4, $fn=30);

// Eyes
translate([-28, -3, 13]) 
    rotate([0, 15, 0]) 
    sphere(r=1.5, $fn=20);  // Right eye
translate([-28, 3, 13]) 
    rotate([0, 15, 0]) 
    sphere(r=1.5, $fn=20);  // Left eye

// Ears
translate([-25, -5, 16]) 
    rotate([45, 0, 0]) 
    scale([1, 1.8, 1]) 
    sphere(r=2, $fn=20);  // Right ear
translate([-25, 5, 16]) 
    rotate([-45, 0, 0]) 
    scale([1, 1.8, 1]) 
    sphere(r=2, $fn=20);  // Left ear

// Tail
translate([10, 0, 10]) 
    rotate([0, -30, 0]) {
    cylinder(h=2, r=3, $fn=30);  // Tail base
    translate([0, 0, 2]) 
        cylinder(h=25, r1=2.5, r2=0.5, $fn=30);  // Tail taper
}

// Legs - Front
translate([-12, -6, -6]) 
    cylinder(h=12, r=2.5, $fn=25);  // Front right
translate([-12, 6, -6]) 
    cylinder(h=12, r=2.5, $fn=25);  // Front left

// Legs - Rear
translate([8, -6, -6]) 
    cylinder(h=12, r=2.5, $fn=25);  // Back right
translate([8, 6, -6]) 
    cylinder(h=12, r=2.5, $fn=25);  // Back left

// Feet
translate([-12, -6, -10]) 
    sphere(r=3, $fn=20);  // Front right foot
translate([-12, 6, -10]) 
    sphere(r=3, $fn=20);  // Front left foot
translate([8, -6, -10]) 
    sphere(r=3, $fn=20);  // Back right foot
translate([8, 6, -10]) 
    sphere(r=3, $fn=20);  // Back left foot

code:
// Osprey Bird Model
// Body and head
translate([0,0,0]) {
    color("brown") 
    resize([50,30,20]) 
    sphere(d=30); // Main body
    
    translate([15,0,5]) 
    color("white") 
    resize([20,18,18]) 
    sphere(d=15); // Head
    
    // Beak
    translate([25,0,5]) 
    color("yellow") 
    rotate([0,-30,0]) 
    cylinder(h=10, r1=2, r2=1, $fn=20);
}

// Wings
module wing() {
    linear_extrude(1.5) 
    polygon(points=[
        [0,0],
        [-50,15],
        [-45,25],
        [-35,30],
        [0,10],
        [35,30],
        [45,25],
        [50,15],
        [0,0]
    ]);
}

translate([0,-5,8]) 
rotate([90,0,0]) 
color("darkgray") 
wing(); // Top wing

translate([0,5,8]) 
rotate([90,0,0]) 
color("darkgray") 
wing(); // Bottom wing

// Tail
translate([-25,0,0]) 
rotate([90,0,0]) 
color("brown") 
linear_extrude(10, center=true) 
polygon(points=[
    [0,0],
    [-15,5],
    [-25,0],
    [-15,-5]
]);

// Legs
module leg() {
    color("yellow") {
        translate([0,0,-8]) 
        cylinder(h=8, r=1, $fn=12); // Upper leg
        
        translate([0,0,-8]) 
        rotate([0,0,30]) 
        cylinder(h=6, r=0.8, $fn=12); // Front toe
        
        translate([0,0,-8]) 
        rotate([0,0,-30]) 
        cylinder(h=6, r=0.8, $fn=12); // Back toe
        
        translate([0,0,-10]) 
        cylinder(h=2, r=1.2, $fn=12); // Foot base
    }
}

translate([5,-8,0]) leg(); // Left leg
translate([5,8,0]) leg(); // Right leg

// Eyes
translate([20,5,8]) 
color("black") 
sphere(r=2, $fn=12); // Right eye

translate([20,-5,8]) 
color("black") 
sphere(r=2, $fn=12); // Left eye
